titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on yttrium oxides having a purity of at least 99.9 percent.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide temporarily for the duty treatment of yttrium oxides having a purity of at least 99.9 percent.
